item.title: BlueSky for Music Science 101
item.description: This post is a brief description and concise argument concerning BlueSky and the #musicscience community.

item.title: Receiving a Letter of Recommendation
item.description: If you are reading this, you are either thinking about or have asked me to write you a letter of recommendation.

item.title: Tips on Scientific Writing
item.description: At the moment, I am providing a lot of feedback on graduate student writing and it feels like I see the same types of errors that I (and I know many others) made when they started scientific/academic writing.
